channel.title: Omg, why do I keep getting disconnected from MoparScape?
channel.description: :confused: When I log into MoparScape, It just says, "LOADING..PLEASE WAIT", and It's dark. Then I look down into the thing and it says that it disconnected. What do i do now? I can't even go on MoparScape now! OMG!

item.title: Omg, why do I keep getting disconnected from MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @M_i_K_e M,i,K,e
item.description:
@M_i_K_e wrote:

Either internet connections bad, or something could be wrong with the server, or character.

Read full topic
item.source: Omg, why do I keep getting disconnected from MoparScape?
